name: Singapore Airlines A350 Long Haul Business Class
description:
Join me as I indulge in the luxury of Singapore Airlines' long haul business class flying from Singapore to Melbourne, Australia. 

This Singapore Airlines business class flight review covers Singapore's Changi Aiport, the Singapore Airlines Krisflyer lounge, boarding, take off, the famous Singapore Girl inflight service, the Krisworld entertainment system and the new Singapore Airlines long haul business class seat as featured on the Airbus A350 and their newly configured Airbus A380 aircraft. 

For more flight reviews please check out my channel or the links at the bottom of this description.  

Route:    Singapore (SIN) to Melbourne, Australia (MEL)
Length:  3,253 miles,  7 hrs
Flight:     SQ207
When:    May 2018
Aircraft:  Airbus A350-9   registration 9V-SMF - Sept 2016
Seat:       21A
Camera:  Sony FDR-AXP53


This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.
